description:
big: added recursive subdivision to nat.string to increase performance 4x to 35x
for medium and long length numbers. extended tests in nat_test to stress the new
code and added benchmarks for performance analysis and setting the subdivision
threshold. (This CL replaces #4634075 since its file info has become lost. The
code here reflects changes from reviewer gri's helpful comments.)
